content: 3 sts k2tog k1 1 st decrease d decrease row 4 ws p to end decrease row 5 sl 1 pwise wyif k to end decrease row 6 p to end repeat decrease row 3-6 until you have 3 sts remaining 2 visit follow share visit us follow us share with us 740 winslow way east #thelambandkid bainbridge island wa @thelambandkid and www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid #tlksherbetbandana the lamb & kid sherbet bandana version 1 // ©2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
